name: Aniliade
description:
Aniliade the demoness has invaded your castle and split your soul into six parts. You need to find all the pieces of your soul in order to escape her grasps .

The Game is still in beta state but it'll be continuously improved until it reaches it apex state.

You can follow the Development of the Game in my social media:

https://twitter.com/EightBlackey

Controls:

WASD - Move

LeftShift (Held) - Run

F - Interact with Objects

LMouseButton - Use Weapon

RMouseButton - DropItem

Left Control - Crouch
